page.title: 03STREET LIFE (continued)
page.content: Each Wednesday the{Book Bus}comes and the big kids pick-on the little ones. Because you don't have to pay to borrow the books some people keep the books and ask to join again. Once someone tried to set the book bus on fire. On the park the big kids tip the swings over the bar so you can't get on them. {Dogs}are always in the dustbins round where we live. Each morning the bin is tipped up and there is a mess. At the top of our garden over the fence there is another house and the kids there are always throwing{rubbish over our yard. Each Wednesday the {Dustbin Men}come and they always leave the back gate open and the{dog}gets out. Last week we never found him for an hour and then he was on Meadow Gardens chasing the kids on the roundabout.
